fields.headline: Live music booking now
fields.bodyText: Not-so-mysterious-yet-masked producer SBTRKT brings his eclectic dubstep-soul-electronica mash up (3-5 Oct, tour begins O2 Academy Bristol) ... Maxïmo Park are back with more literature-strewn alt rock aiming at epic status (1-10 Nov, tour begins O2 Academy, Liverpool) ... A gobworthy stellar lineup of 1977 punkers including Discharge, TV Smith, and Glen Matlock & The Philistines promise spiky moshing at the London Punk Festival (28-30 Sep, 229, W1) ... Fence Collective folkie James Yorkston teams up with original 60s folkie Michael Chapman for a one-off show (24 Sep, Queen Elizabeth Hall, SE1) ... Yet more blistering 60s-style garage punk from the Hives (10-15 Dec, tour begins at Bristol Academy) ... Reunited post-rock giants Godspeed You! Black Emperor add a UK date to their current tour (4 Nov, HMV Forum, NW5) ... And Ultravox fill this week's "back to the 80s" slot with bonus new material (21 Sep-8 Oct, tour begins Colston Hall, Bristol).
